title: This guy(kid) needs to get muted.
body: Well i had a lot of blamers in my team but the main point this kid wished for my mothers death and my death and just the only things he says in chat is to get you really effin down , somebody with depression or deep sadness can do something bad because of these bad people , please mute this guys. I reported him but for this person i want to post it on the forum so he really gets muted as fast as possible. [](https://postimg.org/image/p9hl0udpv/). Excuse me if this is not the place for this post i just could not find the correct one.

replies.body:
Thank you for reporting this player in the post-game lobby. It really does help us prioritize who we look at and I definitely feel you on the concerns you have about players who are already going through a lot in their life.

Going forward, definitely report any other players who go out of their way to create a negative experience for others so we can take it from there. Let me know if you have any questions.
